products.title: Stockholm Rosewood Pink Roller Blind
products.description: This stunning rosewood pink stockholm roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties, which means you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty rosewood pink fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.

products.description: A highly popular range, loved by their customers for its simplicity and value for money, their stockholm fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This luscious pink roller blind adds bold flair, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories, this blind is sure to please. This roller blind with accompanying white components and pink fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window.
